This is an example blog for Political Science 390: Visualizing Political Data at Northwestern University with Sarah Moore. 

This example blog was built with Quarto, with help from Albert Rapp's fabulous ["Ultimate guide to starting a Quarto blog."](https://albert-rapp.de/posts/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide.html)
